Author: blueblackbird_
Text: i second the other comment. it sounds like your family just wants to spend time with you on your bd and there are lots of ways to accomplish that with out having to go out to eat :D  or alternatively if youd rather stay away from them for any reason, then there are plenty of options to treat yourself even if you are alone.  movies is a great start, go out shopping if thats your thing, relax at a park/lake/beach. or make yourself a comfy evening with a good book and a tea.    and no matter what you end up doing, i wish you a birthday where you are comfortable and at least a little bit happy :)   please try to be kind to yourself <3

Author: nowandloud
Text: Go bowling, go see a movie, go play mini golf, etc... There are a lot of options for them that aren't eating if they want to take you out (provided you want to go).
